Represents custom memory pool.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$vk\+\_\+mem\+\_\+alloc.\+h$>$}



\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Represents custom memory pool. 

Fill structure \mbox{\hyperlink{structVmaPoolCreateInfo}{Vma\+Pool\+Create\+Info}} and call function vma\+Create\+Pool() to create it. Call function vma\+Destroy\+Pool() to destroy it.

For more information see \mbox{\hyperlink{choosing_memory_type_choosing_memory_type_custom_memory_pools}{Custom memory pools}}.
